title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, February 11, 2022
description: It’s the birthday of Pico Iyer (1957) who said writing should “be as spontaneous and urgent as a letter to a lover, or a message to a friend who has just lost a parent”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Pico Iyer (1957) who said writing should “be as spontaneous and urgent as a letter to a lover, or a message to a friend who has just lost a parent”
